item.title: 고려 거란 전쟁
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : DEC 30 제목 : 고려 거란 전쟁
출연 : 김동준,최수종,지승현 감독 : 13 에피소드 •드라마 •2023
요약 : 관용의 리더십으로 고려를 하나로 모아 거란과의 전쟁을 승리로 이끈 고려의 황제 현종과 그의 정치 스승이자 고려군 총 사령관이었던 강감찬의 이야기를 담은 드라마

item.title: 왓 이프
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : AUG 15-DEC 30 제목 : 왓 이프
출연 : Chadwick Boseman,Hayley Atwell,Tom Hiddleston 감독 : 9 에피소드 •히어로물 •2021
요약 : 디즈니+에서 공개할 예정인 마블 시네마틱 유니버스 페이즈 4의 다섯 번째 작품이자 마블 스튜디오에서 제작한 첫 번째 애니메이션 시리즈다.

item.title: 고블린 슬레이어
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : OCT 31-DEC 30 제목 : 고블린 슬레이어
출연 : 우메하라 유이치로,여신관,토야마 나오 감독 : 12 에피소드 •애니메이션 •2018
요약 : 고블린에 의해 가족들을 잃어 증오심에 고블린만 죽이며 생활하던 주인공이 모험가가 되어가는 이야기를 그린 애니메이션

item.title: 약사의 혼잣말
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : NOV 6-DEC 25 제목 : 약사의 혼잣말
출연 : 감독 : 12 에피소드 • •2023
요약 : 독과 약에 관한 지식에 심취한 황궁의 하녀. 유곽에서 약사 노릇을 했던 경험을 살려 의문의 사건들을 하나씩 해결해 나간다.

item.title: Rebel Moon(레벨 문): 파트1 불의 아이
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : DEC 24 제목 : Rebel Moon(레벨 문): 파트1 불의 아이
출연 : 소피아 부텔라,디몬 하운수,에드 스크레인 감독 : 잭 스나이더 None hr None min •액션,어드벤처 •2023
요약 : 평화로운 변방 행성에 지배 세력의 군단이 위협을 가하자 신분을 숨기고 마을에서 조용히 살던 이방인 코라와 여러 행성의 아웃사이더 전사들이 모여 은하계의 운명을 건 전투에 나서게 되는 이야기를 그린 넷플릭스 영화

item.title: One Small Step
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : DEC 24 제목 : One Small Step
출연 : CGMeetup 감독 : None hr None min •유튜브,Film & Animation •2018
요약 : CGI 3D Animated Short Film: One Small Step Animated Short Film by TAIKO Studios. Featured on CGMeetup https://www.cgmeetup.com/project/one-small-step-short-film
TAIKO Studios presents the story of Luna is a vibrant young Chinese American girl who dreams of becoming an astronaut. From the day she witnesses a rocket launching into space on TV, Luna is driven to reach for the stars. In the big city, Luna lives with her loving father Chu, who supports her with a humble shoe repair business he runs out of his garage. As Luna grows up, she enters college, facing adversity of all kinds in pursuit of her dreams.
Directed by Andrew Chesworth and Bobby Pontillas Produced by Shaofu Zhang CG Supervisor: Joy Johnson Head of Pipeline: Andrew Jennings Music: Steve Horner
TAIKO is an award winning animation studio that believes in the power of story. Offer services in original content development,​ storyboarding, character design and animation production. https://www.taikostudios.com
SUBSCRIBE to CGMeetup for more inspiring content! http://bit.ly/Sub2CGMeetup Watch More CGI & VFX Animated Short Films: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc6NCp8iAPDa4dBRHY4E5uvuqNcYe8AXX VFX Breakdowns, Making of & Behind the Scene: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLc6NCp8iAPDYMZcYBcEBQRoGidvdi0iPN

WANT TO GET FEATURED? All CGI artists, studios or schools who would like their work featured or published on CGMeetup please apply below. We’re looking for short films, commercial spots, breakdowns, showreels etc. Submit here → http://www.cgmeetup.net/forums/ or http://www.cgmeetup.com Contact us here → info@cgmeetup.net
Please Note: All videos are uploaded after written copyright permission from respected artists, studios or schools or part of the Creative Commons license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode For more details or to dispute please contact us at info@cgmeetup.net.
ABOUT CGMeetup: CGMeetup is the #1 inspiration resource for all CGI, VFX, 3D and Digital artists. We feature a wide variety of CGI content including behind-the- scenes, vfx breakdowns, short films & showreels.
CGMeetup also serves as networking resource for CGI Professionals. Professionals use CGMeetup to exchange ideas, knowledge & job opportunities.

item.title: Siblings | Animated Short Film (ACCD Thesis)
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : DEC 24 제목 : Siblings | Animated Short Film (ACCD Thesis)
출연 : KenetBear 감독 : None hr None min •유튜브,Film & Animation •2022
요약 : Stuck at home during a rainy day, the oldest of two siblings provokes an argument that makes her face the circumstances of her own upbringing.
Siblings is a personal story that Kenet Garcia Rojas directed and developed during his last year at Art Center College of Design. With the production of this film he sharpened his directing skills, organized a production pipeline and learned to oversee a team of talented artists.
Winner - Los Angeles Animation Festival - Silver Student Character-Based Short (2022) Winner - Short Film Factory - Best Relationship (2022) Award Nominee - Borrego Springs Film Festival (2023) Official Selection - 4th Los Angeles Animated Film Festival (2022) Official Selection - 5th Los Angeles Student Film Festival (2022) Official Selection - 5th Los Angeles Student Film Festival (2023) Official Selection - Overmountain Animation Festival (2022) Official Selection - BARCIFF (2022)
SOCIALS: (Me) Kenet Garcia Rojas - Director/Storyboard Artist/Character Animator/Compositor Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kenet.bear/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/kenetbear

item.title: Soft Rain | Animated Short Film (2023)
item.content:encoded:
릴리즈 일자 : DEC 24 제목 : Soft Rain | Animated Short Film (2023)
출연 : Omens Studios 감독 : None hr None min •유튜브,Film & Animation •2023
요약 : An award-winning short film by Sacha Goedegebure and Omens Studios about a man suffering from depression who is caught in a sudden downpour of pink, fluffy balls. At a crowded bus stop, a cheerful looking woman offers him a spot under her umbrella, and together they enjoy the soft rain.
Visit our site: http://www.omens-studios.com/softrain/#
Official Merch: http://shop.omens-studios.com/
Written and Directed by: Sacha Goedegebure
Music by: Jan Morgenstern
Produced by: Kelvin Chow
Executive Producer: Tang Chi Sim
#softrain #omensstudios #omens #animation #claymation #shortfilm #Official #release #mentalhealth
